# [Interview #66: Compuserve Chat, Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=66#24)

#### Martin Reznick

I am an avid reader of author Ayn Rand. A hero in her novel
*The Fountainhead*
matches Rand's physical description exactly. Coincidence?
